channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal judge to decide whether Kilmar Abrego Garcia should return to immigration custody
item.description: A federal judge must decide whether Kilmar Abrego Garcia should return to immigration custody after being free for just over a week

item.title: Boys at her school shared AI-generated, nude images of her. She was the one expelled
item.description: A 13-year-old girl at a Louisiana middle school got into a fight with classmates who were sharing AI-generated nude images of her

item.title: Here's what stores are open, and which ones are closed, on Christmas
item.description: From department stores to grocers, many companies across the U.S. close early on Christmas Eve and shut their doors entirely on Christmas Day — while ...

item.title: Flight rules make ‘Home Alone 2’ plot less plausible today
item.description: The “Home Alone” movies turned holiday travel chaos into comedy

item.title: Flash flooding in northern California leads to soaked roads, water rescues and one death
item.description: Heavy rain and flash flooding have soaked roads in northern California, leading to water rescues and at least one confirmed death
